titleInfo.title: Online Appendix III: German transcripts and English translations

mods.abstract: This is part of the Online Appendix of the book Talking Collective Action. It provides the original German transcripts of all the English translations of transcripts in the book. The excerpts are thus cross-referenced with the English excerpts in the book. The excerpts are from transcripts of meetings that are based on audio-recordings. They were recorded, anonymized, transcribed, and translated by the author. More information about the activists and activities mentioned in the excerpts can be found in Talking Collective Action, including transcript conven­tions.
